elements.title: Grant's Tomb (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that no one is buried in Grant's Tomb (pictured)?

elements.title: Crown Princess Gonghoe (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that King Seonjo considered necromancy for Crown Princess Gonghoe's funeral because her remains were lost during the 1592 Japanese invasion of Korea?

elements.title: Renai Circulation (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that in 2019, Chinese electronics company Xiaomi posted a video of their third-quarterly financial report featuring a parody of the anime song "Renai Circulation"?

elements.title: Xochitl Gomez (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Xochitl Gomez was aged 13 when she first auditioned for the 18-year-old America Chavez in Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness?

elements.title: world's most powerful woman fourteen times (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Forbes named German chancellor Angela Merkel the world's most powerful woman fourteen times?

elements.title: Parthenope (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that future Loud LDN member Parthenope left her 200-year-old violin on a train?

elements.title: Squid Game re-enactment (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that MrBeast's Squid Game re-enactment was described as "perverse" and a misunderstanding of the original?

elements.title: Project Carryall (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Project Carryall proposed the detonation of 23 nuclear devices in California to build a road?
